ygData.subject: RE: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She s not broken on Innoruuk, and I would doubt she is broken on any intelligent server where stoopid noob f ing idiots don t attack her.  I mean jeez...
ygData.messageBody:
>Genni is currently broken at least on Cazic Thule,
>prolly on all servers.

She's not broken on Innoruuk, and I would doubt she is broken
on any 'intelligent' server where stoopid noob f'ing idiots
don't attack her. I mean jeez... Named NPCs don't mean new
camping grounds. I'm glad I watched some craphead level 45
person die hard when he attempted to kill her. Then I reamed
him. No one has attacked her since, that I know of. She's
always been available.

I have all the pieces of lambent now, save the helm which sucks.
Saturday early morning I clocked in with all the goodies.
However, I will probably acquire it to test something out --
I'm just not in a hurry to do so.

Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
